quote: This is the pain pacemaker. I've got a battery under my skin. From that battery are two electrodes that go into the spine where they cut bone away to accommodate it. Now I put on the power here. If I have the pain, the stimulator starts. It's tingling, like when your foot falls asleep, you know?
name: Jerry Lewis

quote: In reality, Republicans have long been at war with clean energy. They have ridiculed investments in solar and wind power, bashed energy-efficiency standards, attacked state moves to promote renewable energy and championed laws that would enshrine taxpayer subsidies for fossil fuels while stripping them from wind and solar.
name: Jeff Goodell

quote: The sublimity of administration consists in knowing the proper degree of power that should be exerted on different occasions.
name: Charles de Montesquieu

quote: Mark Ruffalo, aka the Incredible Hulk, is the natural gas industry's worst nightmare: a serious, committed activist who is determined to use his star power as a superhero in the hottest movie of the moment to draw attention the environmental and public health risks of fracking.
name: Jeff Goodell

quote: We say no to lots of things that would please us. I would like to punch people every now and then, but I don't. I would like to have something for free rather than pay for it. I would like to skip to the front of the line... I don't mean to brush aside the taste of meat, which is a powerful attraction. But its power is not without limit.
name: Jonathan Safran Foer

quote: The coal industry is an even larger part of the Australian economy than it is of the American, and it has an enormous amount of political power.
name: Jeff Goodell

quote: A tool is usually more simple than a machine it is generally used with the hand, whilst a machine is frequently moved by animal or steam power.
name: Charles Babbage

quote: Bloomberg's $50 million is not going to revolutionize the electric power industry. But his willingness to fight is already inspiring others to see Big Coal differently.
name: Jeff Goodell

quote: Another mode of accumulating power arises from lifting a weight and then allowing it to fall.
name: Charles Babbage

quote: One thing you can say about nuclear power: the people who believe it is the silver bullet for America's energy problems never give up.
name: Jeff Goodell
